panels.title: Current total of incoming / outgoing bytes
Frontend - Current total of incoming / outgoing bytes
Backend - Current total of incoming / outgoing bytes
Server - Current total of incoming / outgoing bytes

panels.description: Number of active sessions on frontend and backend.
panels.title: Total Current Sessions

panels.description:
The Session rate section, in the context of a frontend, describes the rate at which clients are connecting to HAProxy.

In the context of a backend server, a session means the same as a connection. These statistics show the rate at which connections are being made to a server.
panels.title: Total Current Sessions Rate
Frontend - Current number of active sessions

panels.description:
Current number of sessions rate per second over last elapsed second.

Rate at which sessions, which are entities that hold the state of an end-to-end connection (client to HAProxy and HAProxy to backend server), are being created
panels.title: Frontend - Current number of session rate
Backend - Current number of active sessions

panels.description:
The Current session rate, per second, at which connections are being established to the server.

In the context of a backend server, a session means the same as a connection. These statistics show the rate at which connections are being made to a server.
panels.title: Backend - Current number of session rate
Server - Current number of active sessions
Server - Current number of session rate

panels.description: Maximum observed number of active sessions and configured session limit.
panels.title: Frontend - Maximum observed number of active sessions and limit

panels.description: Maximum observed number of sessions per second and configured limit on new sessions per second.
panels.title: Frontend - Maximum number of session rate and limit

panels.description: Maximum observed number of active sessions and configured session limit.
panels.title: Backend - Maximum observed number of active sessions and limit

panels.description: Maximum observed number of sessions per second.
panels.title: Backend - Maximum number of session rate

panels.description: Maximum observed number of active sessions and configured session limit.
panels.title: Server - Maximum observed number of active sessions and limit

panels.description: Maximum observed number of sessions per second.
panels.title: Server - Maximum number of session rate

panels.description: The amount of time it took to successfully connect to the server, averaged over the last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Backend average connect time

panels.description: The server response time, averaged over the last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Backend average response time

panels.description: The total session time, averaged over the last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Backend average total time

panels.description: The amount of time that a connection stayed queued while waiting for a connection slot to the server, averaged over the last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Backend average queue time

panels.description: Number of times that a connection was retried. The redispatch values show the number of times that HAProxy failed to establish a connection to a server and redispatched it to another server.
panels.title: Backend - Rate of Retry/Redispatch warnings

panels.description: Number of times that a connection was retried. The redispatch values show the number of times that HAProxy failed to establish a connection to a server and redispatched it to another server.
panels.title: Server - Rate of Retry/Redispatch warnings

panels.description: Total number of failed check (Only when the server is up).
panels.title: Server - Check failures

panels.description: Total duration of the latest server health check.
panels.title: Server - Check duration
